item.title: 1.18.63-alpha
item.description: CHANGES FROM v1.17: * Update dependencies * Update Chinese translation (by Clazex) * Reselect lines after performing merge operations in Conflict Solver (by scrangos) * New hotkeys: Ctrl+Left Ctrl+Right that find the previous conflict and next conflict (by scrangos) * If there are 4+ definitions including the virtual definition, skip the stellaris definition if its there when the conflict is being selected as the default selected definition for the left side (by scrangos) * Add show self conflicts mod filter option (self conflicts are ignored by default now) * Add option to export to Paradox Launcher Json format (min launcher version 2021.7.rc5) * Conflict Solver bracket count (by scrangos) * Various fixes

item.title: 1.18.63-alpha
item.description: CHANGES FROM v1.17: * Update dependencies * Update Chinese translation (by Clazex) * Reselect lines after performing merge operations in Conflict Solver (by scrangos) * New hotkeys: Ctrl+Left Ctrl+Right that find the previous conflict and next conflict (by scrangos) * If there are 4+ definitions including the virtual definition, skip the stellaris definition if its there when the conflict is being selected as the default selected definition for the left side (by scrangos) * Add show self conflicts mod filter option (self conflicts are ignored by default now) * Add option to export to Paradox Launcher Json format (min launcher version 2021.7.rc5) * Conflict Solver bracket count (by scrangos) * Various fixes

RELEASE NOTES: This is a significant upgrade to Irony. Please backup your collections made with previous versions of Irony.
* Fix rare instance where overwritten objects were not properly overriden (Stellaris)
CHANGES FROM v1.16: * Updated dependencies * Patch exporter order of save operations changed a bit to be more robust * Fix custom patch and db search windows bugging out on some linux distros * Add feature to include game files in conflict solver analysis * Country types are treated in the same manner as pop_jobs (for Stellaris) * Add export mods feature along with load order * Various improvements and fixes
